text: Mr. Bryan Stonehouse's production is quietly effective, giving full value to the formal elements of Betti's writing without over-emphasizing them. Last night's play in the Play of the Week series on independent television, Then We Fall, by Mr. Paul Ferris, was a morality on the not unfamiliar theme of the destructive power of unbridled ambition.
handwritten_text: Mr. Bryan Stonehouse's production is quietly effective, giving full value to the formal elements of Betti's writing without over-emphasizing them. Last night's play in the Play of the Week series on independent television, Then We Fall, by Mr. Paul Ferris, was a morality on the not unfamiliar theme of the destructive power of unbridled ambition.
